title: $2000 FIXED for 7 Days Job (DO NOT BID without reading description)
desc: Hi,IMPORTANT: If you don't have any live shopify app to show me, please DO NOT bid and waste my time. If you cannot get the quality work done in 7 days, DO NOT waste my time. It's very important that i need quality guaranteed app within 7 days of awarding project.-----------I am looking to get a private shopify app developed.The app is like this:[url removed, login to view]However above app is too advanced. The app that i want should:1) On install, it should also upload a CSV file called products (which is just a shopify product file)2) If that specific product is sold (based on tag) then it shows in apps dashboard under 'Pending' section.3) [Important part] every product and its variant should automatically be assigned a random SKU number however that same 'random' sku number should be connected to a specific SKU number that we would provide you. So basically it should have an app database. So, when that product is sold, it's random SKU match with the SKU as in database and update a price in user's dashboard under pending (Supplier price )4) The amount due under 'Pending', once paid, move to 'fulfilment' and once we fulfill item, we need a backend from where we can update customer's order as fulfilled and enter tracking information.5) Customer should have option to change information like Address and size of variant while it's in pending and once customer pay for it, we could only received updated information.6) Customer (the one who installed app) should have 'billing' option where he can see all past payments made to us.7) If we issue refund from backend, customer should see it in the app, under that specific order.8) Other functions of same app.9) Paste this line in your comment (I Love My Work) only then i would even read your proposal, this shows you have read the project till here.So there would be an app with dashboard for customer and backend for us. Backend needs to be easy to operate and we should be able to perform action on specific shopify store (who installed our app).Please note these are not all requirements, as i am personally not from technical background, its not possible for me to list all. You need to look at that app and decide.Time Frame: Need this app ready in 7 Days. If you cant do it, let's not waste our time.Milestone Terms: If you have more then 97% project completion records and atleast 50+  (4.8 rank minimum ) reviews, i could do 100% milestone upfront.Project budget includes 1 year of after sales service (AMC) in case if app stop working for ANY reason, you need to update it. We will leave review only after 2 months of receiving final app.Thanks

title: Start up in need of long-term partner(s)! Developing Apps & Websites
desc: I am a construction project manager and my partner is a web-developer. We are based in Munich Germany and are looking for a long-term partner for future projects.We are in need of somebody or a team that can develop an photo management and archiving app that works on Android & Apple Smartphones and Tabletts. It is called PICTOCOM.We will handle design, but you will have to program it.WHAT THE APP IS ABOUT:The construction site manager takes a lot of photos of the houses and work during the construction process because he has to document everything. It is a lot of work to export those pictures, rename them and organize them. That is why we wanted to create an app that does that for you. By selecting what you are going to take a picture of, the construction manager doesn't need to organize the photos afterwards. As they will already be in the correct folder and they will be exported to an server.PICTOCOM requirements:1.	Server and Online Web-App:2.	Web server: Apache or Windows Server 20163.	Database: Mysql4.	For Frontend and Backend interface work with PHP 75.	XML construction for the structure6.	Mobile Frontend Feature:7.	User Login and Logout Feature8.	Admin and User roles9.	Camera Interface10.	Temporary local save photo data on the Mobil phone11.	Automatic creation of folder structure from Admin and User account12.	Uploading from temporary photo- and file data13.	Uploading files comes to the Online Server14.	Frontend Multi-Language option15.	Multi-Language file for all words (EN-file, DE-file, NL-file…..)16.	Platform independent for all Mobile devices17.   Webbased interface will be needed for us as Superadmins and for the   Users to organize/manage their pictures.MOCK-UP:We have developed a Mock-Up which you can visit through this link,  the buttons are clickable!Admin Walkthrough (Admin can create Alpha user groups and invite Alpha users):[url removed, login to view]Alpha user Walkthrough (Alpha can create a Folder structure, invite Beta user and make/archive pictures):[url removed, login to view]Beta user Walkthrough (can make/archive pictures and view taken pictures):[url removed, login to view]TELL US SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF:We would like to get to know you before we do business with you.1) What is your specialty, in what do you specifically stand out?2) Can you give us 2 – 3 examples of projects that you finished the past 6 months? What was your biggest project, what are you most proud of? (please enclose links)3) Tell us about you/your team. sell yourself! :)PRICEPlease give us your price estimation and time estimation.Please tell us how many people will work on the app and what their specialty is (i.e. developer, project manager, etc.)We are looking for a reliable developer whom could also help us in future endeavors. We prefer a fixed price.

title: Simple private messaging and common posting wall app
desc: I’m looking to get a simple private messaging and common posting wall app built that integrates with Azure services. The project needs to be built as a cross platform mobile app for iOS and Android (If possible UWP as well but not required) using Xamarin. As mentioned I would also like to utilise Microsoft Azure services such as Service Bus for the messaging and Blob storage for posting functionality. Below is a brief description of what I’m trying to achieve for the two different sections of this app:Private messaging:•	Integration with Azure Service Bus•	Encapsulated message box showing the followingo	Fromo	Message bodyo	Delivery timeo	Time reado	Dynamic sizing to fit messageCommon Posting Wall:•	Layout similar to a Facebook wall•	Able to post text, links, pictures, and videos with comments•	File uploads are to be saved to Azure blob storage or similar•	Users can comment and like posts•	Live refresh scrolling to the latest postMaster detail page linking these two items together.I have done some basic concepts up for what these pages would look like using Justinmind and would be happy to share these if needed. I’m also very open to suggestions and recommendations for each of the above points.Please feel free to contact me for more information around timelines and pricing.Thanks Daniel.

title: ANDROID APP : TASK MANAGER. NO BIDS FROM INDIAPAKISTAN
desc: CONCEPT: every task in life, such as 'eat sandwich' has multiple steps, such as 'buy bread, buy ham, buy lettuce, assemble sandwich, open mouth, close mouth.. :) The idea is an app that presents the user with one step at a time, so that a big complex task becomes simple and manageable.Here is the process: The user clicks a 'NEW TASK' button. NEW TASK SCREEN OPENS . Input boxes: task name , task objective. Then a button ADD FIRST STEP IN THE TASK to add task steps, with once a STEP is created, user can add NEXT STEP, and so on, as many steps as he wants , add a finish date and click SAVE.USER SCREEN has list of existing tasks.Each task will show 1) task name 2) task objective 3) finish date, 4) next step and DONE BUTTON 5) EDIT / DELETE buttonThe basic principle is that the app will display for each task, the NEXT STEP. Once a step is finished user can click the DONE button. Once DONE button is clicked he is now presented with the NEXT STEP from the entered steps. Once he is on the last step, he is presented with the FINISH TASK button.There will be a log button for each task that will take him to a text screen that shows when the task was created, which steps are finished and dates and times steps were finished , which steps remain etc etc.Users have to login /signup. Users get a 30 day free trial, and if they want to continue they have to sign up with a paypal subscription.Admin panel (on website) shows members,  type of membership, duration, dates payment was made etc. Admin can enter his paypal id here, change his admin password, change emails (welcome email, registration email , membership will expire soon email, premium membership email, membership has expired etc)EVERYTHING MUST BE 100% RESPONSIVE DESIGN, must look pleasing to the eye.ABSOLUTELY NO BIDS FROM INDIAPAKISTAN PLEASE. BUDGET 150

title: squash rules android app
desc: The task is to write a simple android app to my design. The app has a series of hardcoded rules of squash in the form of statements held in a table. Each statement has three entries: i) the statement, ii) a true or false value, iii) explanation.I have written a version of the app already but it is quite poor. however I have a clear idea of the basic flows.  I can write a more detailed description.   I should be able to get the source code and amend if needed.The user sees an introductory page. Then a page with a series of four statements. The user marks true or false against each. The next page gives a score out of four. Then each rule is show successively:with the followingStatement aaaaaYou said TrueThe right answer is TrueYou were RightExplanation aaaaaaaaaaaI will provide a table of rules and explanations.It should be possible to modify the app for different sports by changing the screen and rule base but little else.

title: home automation app
desc: this is a light/home automation app.all of the hardware infrastructure is already in place. we will be communicating with chips over wifi to get their states.i require 3 separate versions: iOS app, android app and web version. all from 1 codebase. so ideally something like ionic/cordova should be used for development.All platforms should have identical functionality for now. Ui/ux should be consistent too across all platformsAll apps should have a user login system (email and password). And should cater for if a user forgets password.apps should be in such a way that they're accepted onto the google and apple app stores.I think it's important for a user to be able to register  on the app or to at least show that they're interested and I should be notified about that and be able to communicate with them (via email)Try and support as much versions of iOS and android possible without compromising functionality.Login screens should also have "remember me" functionality so that users don't have to login each and every time they open the app.Once a user has logged in. They should be able to rename their lights to whatever they want and this should reflect across all platforms.A user should be able to control connections individually as well as control all devices at onceThe user should be able to see the states of the connection (light) as either "on","off" or "offline/unreachable"To demonstrate that you can access the features of devices. There should also be an option for users to login with fingerprint authentication depending on whether it's available on the devices that they're on.There should be an indicator to show whether or not commands are being successfully sent to the houseConnections should be able to be made from both wifi as well as cellular connectionsAny changes should reflect in realtime across platforms. So if a light is switched on on an iPhone it should immediately show/reflect if other users are logged in on an android  and on web without having to manually refresh the screen.Once logged in, there should be logout functionalityUsers should be able to control their homes both locally as well as remotely.there will also be a non disclosure agreement which will have to be signed prior to development starting.

title: QR Code payment app
desc: I need an functional mobile app (iOS or Android) for a paper i am writing. The app wont be launched and I don't need big improvements at it. It will work like the Wallet Function in the WeChat app from China.Its two modules, pay and receive. The "pay" module will display a QR Code and a regular barcode that changes every minute (to simulate a token), it will also have QR Code reader to scan codes to send money. The "receive" will display a fixed QR Code  that identifies the user.I need to simulate at least 4 scenarios.1st where someone pays by getting its QR or regular code read by a scanner,2nd when someone pays by scanning the the QR Code from another user.3rd receiving money showing its own QR Code, 4th Online buying, scanning a QR Code from a website to make a payment.I need the app find the QR Code, that can be previously fixed to one those scenarios, shows one screen with description and price, does not need to match QR Code INFO, just looks like its doing it.Its almost like an Invision prototype, but with the camere function on.

title: Product promotion app (iOS and Android)
desc: We will need you to submit a fixed-cost proposal for this project.1. iOS Support: Current models only (iPhone SE, 6s, 6s+, 7, 7+, 8, 8+, X)2. Android: 6.0+We want a mobile app, to be distributed via the Apple App Store and Google Play, which will be used to promote a line of products. The design for the apps is still in progress, but the basic structure is outlined below, along with notes on expected behaviors.1. Contact Us screenText description of our locations- Email hyperlink- Office addresses (perhaps 2-3) with links to Maps application on phone- In-line map showing one office2. Product Info screens (5)We have five products, each will need their own dedicated screen in the app. Each product screen will use the same layout template.- Text description of product- 1–3 image carousels. For each carousel, we will provide you with 13 to 150 images that the user must be able to rapidly swipe forward and backwards through (creating a sort of rapid ‘animation’ by switching the images quickly). These will be in GIF, JPG, or PNG format.- 1 embedded video. The video will be provided in MP4 format. We will need standard playback controls on each video.3. Work Sample screenWe will have multiple embedded carousels and videos, as in the Product Info screens. Estimated 10 carousels and 5 videos. Each carousel and video will be accompanied by a link to a corresponding Product Info screen.4. Magazine screen- We will provide a PDF file that needs to readable inside the application.- The PDF file can be bundled with the application or downloaded after the application has been installed.- Users will be able to swipe back and forth to move to different pages within the document.- The PDF will likely be under 50 pages, and each page will contain text, images, and hyperlinks which can be opened in a web view within the application. - After initial download, the PDF magazine must be readable if the user does not have internet connectivity.5. Home screen This will be the initial screen within the application. This will likely contain a header/logo image and text that we will need to be able to modify remotely.6. QR Code Scanner screen- The user must be able to scan a QR code using their mobile phone camera.- The QR code scanner must be able to recognize QR codes that correspond to each of the Product Info screens within the app.- After scanning a recognized code, the app needs to take the user to the correct Product Info screen within the app.Other details:- All content will be English-language only.- However, the final apps must be suitable for distribution in the global iOS and Android app stores (Apple App Store and Google Play).- We will provide all designs, images, assets, and PDFs needed.Project Type: One-time projectOne-time Project: Develop a prototypeDevices: iPhone, AndroidProject Stage: Fully SpecifiedYou will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:1. What are some examples of cross-platform apps you have created in the past? Do you have examples of apps that have custom animations or animated images?

title: Mobile microsite
desc: We will need you to submit a fixed-cost proposal for this project.We need a website that specifically supports latest versions of mobile Safari (iOS) and Chrome (Android) for smartphones and tablets only. It should be responsive, although no special design guidance will be provided for scaling up the site to desktop resolutions.This site will be used to promote a line of products. The design for the site is still in progress, but the basic structure is outlined below, along with notes on expected behaviors.1. Contact Us screen* Text description of our locations* Email hyperlink* Office addresses (perhaps 2-3) with links to Maps application on phone* In-line map showing one office2. Product Info pages (5)We have five products, each will need their own dedicated screen in the site. Each product screen will use the same layout template.* Text description of product* 1–3 image carousels. For each carousel, we will provide you with 13 to 150 images that the user must be able to rapidly swipe forward and backwards through (creating a sort of rapid ‘animation’ by switching the images quickly). These will be in GIF, JPG, or PNG format.* 1 embedded video. The video will be provided in MP4 format. We will need standard playback controls on each video.3. Work Sample pageWe will have multiple embedded carousels and videos, as in the Product Info screens. Estimated 10 carousels and 5 videos. Each carousel and video will be accompanied by a link to a corresponding Product Info screen.4. Magazine page* We will provide a PDF file that needs to readable inside the site.* We may optionally want the PDF to be separately available as a downloadable file that can be read offline.* Users will be able to swipe back and forth to move to different pages within the document.* The PDF will likely be under 50 pages, and each page will contain text, images, and hyperlinks which will open in a new tab or window.5. Home pageThis will be the initial page on the site. This will likely contain a header/logo image and text that we will need to be able to modify remotely, e.g., through a CMS or another interface.6. QR Code Scanner page* We would like the user to be able to scan a QR code using their mobile phone camera.* The QR code scanner must be able to recognize QR codes that correspond to each of the Product Info screens within the app.* After scanning a recognized code, the app needs to take the user to the correct Product Info screen within the app.* If embedding a QR code reader within a web page is infeasible, perhaps due to limitations of mobile Safari or Chrome, then we would want to allow the user to take a picture with their phone camera of the QR code and submit it to the site.Other details:* All content will be English-language only.* We will provide all designs, images, assets, and PDFs needed.Project Stage: Fully SpecifiedOne-time Project: Create landing pageProject Type: One-time projectYou will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:1. What are some examples of websites you have created in the past? Do you have examples of sites that have custom animations or animated images?
